attributes.action: dnar (do not attempt resuscitation) free for all people not just those dying
attributes.additional_details: I would like this dnar avalible for all adults not just people who are dying of illness, drs do not have the right to help people die but yet they have the right to keep people alive and some people this is not there belief or wish to may anything happen to them, some people have tattoos stateing dnr but this is also not viable drs will still try to resuscitate i would like this changed for people who are of sound mind to beable to sign a dnar form when they or if they choose to not just when they are ill or dying.
